RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, A.USER_REF_NO, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.LATEST_EVENT_SEQ_NO, D.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, A.COUNTERPARTY, F.SHORT_NAME, F.CUSTOMER_NAME1, A.CONTRACT_CCY, E.CCY_NAME, B.PRINCIPAL_OUTSTANDING_BAL FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A, OLTBS_CONTRACT_BALANCE B, OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD C, OLTMS_PRODUCT D, CYTMS_CCY_DEFN E, OLTMS_CUSTOMER F, OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER G WHERE A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS = 'A' AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = G.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = G.VERSION_NO /*AND G.ROLLOVER_ALLOWED = 'N'*/ AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = D.PRODUCT_CODE AND A.CONTRACT_CCY = E.CCY_CODE AND A.COUNTERPARTY = F.CUSTOMER_NO AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = C.PRODUCT AND C.PROD_SCH_TYPE = 'N' AND (C.PAYMENT_METHOD = 'B' or (C.PAYMENT_METHOD IN ('D', 'T') AND (exists (SELECT 1 FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_PREFERENCE K WHERE K.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND DISCOUNTED_SCH = 'Y' and version_no = (select max(version_no) from OLTB_CONTRACT_PREFERENCE m WHERE m.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO))))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_SPLIT_MASTER M WHERE M.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND M.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND M.SPLIT_STATUS = 'U')

SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, A.USER_REF_NO, A.CONTRACT_CCY, B.PRINCIPAL_OUTSTANDING_BAL, D.MATURITY_DATE, D.VALUE_DATE FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT A, OLTBS_CONTRACT_BALANCE B, OLTMS_PRODUCT_MASTER_LD C, OLTBS_CONTRACT_MASTER D WHERE A.BRANCH = sypks_utils.get_branch(?) AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'OL' AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS = 'A' AND A.AUTH_STATUS = 'A' AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = D.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = D.VERSION_NO /*AND D.ROLLOVER_ALLOWED = 'N'*/ AND D.MATURITY_DATE = ? AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO <> ? AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO NOT IN (SELECT CHILD_REF_NO FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_MERGE_DETAIL WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ? AND MERGE_SERIAL_NO = ?) AND A.COUNTERPARTY = ? AND A.CONTRACT_CCY = ? AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'L' AND B.PRINCIPAL_OUTSTANDING_BAL > 0 AND A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.PRODUCT_CODE = C.PRODUCT AND C.PROD_SCH_TYPE = 'N' AND ((C.PAYMENT_METHOD = 'B' AND 0 = (SELECT NVL(SUM(Z.AMOUNT_DUE) - SUM(Z.AMOUNT_SETTLED) + SUM(Z.ADJUSTED_AMOUNT), 0) FROM OLTBS_AMOUNT_DUE_CS Z WHERE Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND Z.INFLOW_OUTFLOW = CASE WHEN Z.COMPONENT = 'PRINCIPAL' THEN 'I' ELSE Z.INFLOW_OUTFLOW END AND Z.COMPONENT_TYPE IN ('P', 'I') AND OLPKS_SERVICESY.FN_IS_RISTOURNE_COMPONENT(Z.COMPONENT,Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO) = 'N' AND Z.COMPONENT NOT IN (SELECT COMPONENT FROM LFTBS_CONTRACT_INTEREST WHERE CONTRACT_REFERENCE_NO = Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND EVENT_SEQUENCE_NO = (SELECT MAX(EVENT_SEQUENCE_NO) FROM LFTBS_CONTRACT_INTEREST WHERE CONTRACT_REFERENCE_NO = Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO) AND NVL(CONSIDER_FOR_LIQ, 'Y') = 'N') AND Z.DUE_DATE < ?)) OR (C.PAYMENT_METHOD IN ('D', 'T') AND 0 = (SELECT NVL(SUM(Z.AMOUNT_DUE) - SUM(Z.AMOUNT_SETTLED) + SUM(Z.ADJUSTED_AMOUNT), 0) FROM OLTBS_AMOUNT_DUE_CS Z WHERE Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND Z.INFLOW_OUTFLOW = CASE WHEN Z.COMPONENT = 'PRINCIPAL' THEN 'I' ELSE Z.INFLOW_OUTFLOW END AND Z.COMPONENT_TYPE IN ('P', 'I') AND OLPKS_SERVICESY.FN_IS_RISTOURNE_COMPONENT(Z.COMPONENT,Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO) = 'N' AND Z.COMPONENT NOT IN (SELECT COMPONENT FROM LFTBS_CONTRACT_INTEREST WHERE CONTRACT_REFERENCE_NO = Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND EVENT_SEQUENCE_NO = (SELECT MAX(EVENT_SEQUENCE_NO) FROM LFTBS_CONTRACT_INTEREST WHERE CONTRACT_REFERENCE_NO = Z.CONTRACT_REF_NO)) AND Z.DUE_DATE < ?))) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT_SPLIT_MASTER M WHERE M.CONTRACT_REF_NO = A.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND M.AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND M.SPLIT_STATUS = 'U') AND A.USER_DEFINED_STATUS = (SELECT K.STATUS FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_STATUS_MASTER K WHERE K.PRODUCT = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND K.STATUS_SEQUENCE = (SELECT L.STATUS_SEQUENCE FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT_STATUS_MASTER L WHERE L.PRODUCT = sypks_utils.get_product(?) AND L.STATUS = (SELECT USER_DEFINED_STATUS FROM OLTBS_CONTRACT WHERE CONTRACT_REF_NO = ?)))
